title: Hands on with Windows 11's 'never combine' taskbar feature
description: In its upcoming 23H2 release slated for fall, one of the standout features that has caught the eye of many is the 'never combine mode' for the taskbar. [...]

title: Google Chrome to warn when installed extensions are malware
description: Google is testing a new feature in the Chrome browser that will warn users when an installed extension has been removed from the Chrome Web Store, usually indicative of it being malware. [...]

title: Cuba ransomware uses Veeam exploit against critical U.S. organizations
description: The Cuba ransomware gang was observed in attacks targeting critical infrastructure organizations in the United States and IT firms in Latin America, using a combination of old and new tools. [...]
